_header: Harkeneth all the mild speech / That Matthew here will us teach
_description: Gospel ‘In festo Sancti Stephani’, in ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Herkneþ alle þe Mylde specheÞat Matheu here wol vs
                    teche…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…To þat blisse he us bringeþat is kyng of alle
                    kynge. Amen.

                poet.a.1,

Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.

         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
HErkeneþ alle þe milde specheþat Matheu here wol vs
                    teche…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…To þat blys he vs bryngeÞat is kyng of alle
                    þinge. Amen
